snippet: The anticorruption agency in Hong Kong has arrested the brothers Raymond and Thomas Kwok, two of the world's wealthiest men, who run the city's largest real estate group. It's being suggested that their eldest brother - who was pushed out as the...
abstract: The anticorruption agency in Hong Kong has arrested the brothers Raymond and Thomas Kwok, two of the world's wealthiest men, who run the city's largest real estate group. It's being suggested that their eldest brother - who was pushed out as the company chairman years ago - might have ratted them out.
